solution_line_template: One-third of all the kids are girls, which means {girls_fraction} * {total_children} = <<{girls_fraction}*{total_children}={number_of_girls}>>{number_of_girls} children.
So there are {total_children} - {number_of_girls} = <<{total_children}-{number_of_girls}={number_of_boys}>>{number_of_boys} boys in the classroom.
